Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ball

  • public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a simple solid sphere. This class represents a Ball object. When combined with the GameArena class, instances of the Ball class can be displayed on the screen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ball(double x, double y, double diameter, java.lang.String col)
      constructor for the Ball

      • Ball

            double y,
            double diameter,
            java.lang.String col)
        constructor for the Ball
        Parameters:
        x, - set the initial x-coordinate of the Ball
        y, - set the initial y-coordinate of the Ball
        diameter, - the diameter of the Ball in pixels
        col, - a String representing the colour of the Ball

        moves this Ball according to the current speed

      • bounce

        public void bounce(double maxX,
                   double maxY)
        moves this Ball and checks for the edge of the GameArena
        Parameters:
        maxX, - the x edge of the GameArena in pixels
        maxY, - the y edge of the GameArena in pixels

      • collision

        public void collision(Ball b)
        simple collision detection and bounce between Balls - doesn't obey the laws of physics.
        Parameters:
        b, - the Ball to check this Ball against.

      • setFriction

        public void setFriction(double friction)
        sets the level of friction applied to this Ball
        Parameters:
        friction, - the level of friction to apply to this Ball, default is 0.9

      • getFriction

        public double getFriction()
        obtains the level of friction applied to this Ball
        Returns:
        friction

      • gravity

        public void gravity(double maxX,
                    double maxY)
        applies gravity to this Ball when calculating movement, also detects the edge of the GameArena
        Parameters:
        maxX, - the edge of the GameArena
        maxY, - the edge of the GameArena

      • display

        public void display()
        displays the settings of this Ball, including colour, size and position

      • isEaten

        public void isEaten()
        sets this Ball's isEaten state to true.

      • getEaten

        public boolean getEaten()
        checks whether this Ball has been eaten
        Returns:
        true if the Ball has been eaten
